scene.name: intro
scene.line: See, told you he was one of those distillery guys.
I guess you were right. These other guys came to pick him up for work maybe? I don't like how they all hang out together, it's creepy.
`We` hang out together, and work together.

Yeah, but it's not ... They're like more than co-workers. I don't know. I just get this awful feeling whenever I see them. Like I knew them once, but not anymore ... like when they make up a dead person to look like an old photograph of themselves.
Sort of familiar, sort of strange.
Yeah, exactly. There ought to be a word for that.
